snippet: More than 50 people suspected of working in clandestine abortion clinics were arrested weeks after two women were found dead after seeking abortions, the police in Rio de Janeiro said.
abstract: Brazilian police arrest more than 50 people suspected of working in clandestine abortion clinics; abortion is illegal in country except under extreme circumstances.
lead_paragraph: More than 50 people suspected of working in clandestine abortion clinics were arrested weeks after two women were found dead after seeking abortions, the police in Rio de Janeiro said.

headline.main: Brazil Cracks Down on Illegal Abortion Clinics
